meanings.definition: Relating to the period of study before obtaining a doctorate.
meanings.sent1: The predoctoral students were eager to learn and succeed.
meanings.sent2: She enrolled in predoctoral courses to prepare for her future studies.
meanings.sent3: The predoctoral candidates formed a study group to tackle tough subjects together.
meanings.sent4: His predoctoral dedication shone brightly during the research project.
meanings.sent5: The predoctoral journey was challenging but rewarding in the end.

meanings.definition: Of or pertaining to the time before completing a doctoral program.
meanings.sent1: The predoctoral research focused on gathering data for the thesis.
meanings.sent2: They attended predoctoral seminars to enhance their knowledge.
meanings.sent3: The predoctoral phase felt like a stepping stone towards greater achievements.
meanings.sent4: Her predoctoral commitment was evident in her academic achievements.
meanings.sent5: The predoctoral period was a crucial step in their academic journey.
